trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hesperia
There was one other sighting in Hesperia on or around April 20th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMarbury, I saw the same thing you stated, circle type sphere in my room facing east followed by lasers hidding and disappearing in Mayan callendar pointing at the 3rd and 4rth arrow between 1:30 and 4:30 am, on the same day you saw it. All week and week before I have seen theese lights and and lasers in my room. Also no dogs barking at neighborhood. I try to stay awake but I cant. What is this. strange noises are heard, I have notified police when noises are heard, oficers dont hear any thing. One more thing when noises are heard it seems like helicoper hovers over my home to distract my concentration from listening further at noise. 34.437445, -117.332495 34.437445 -117.332495 N34��� 26.2467', W117��� 19.9497'
Summary: It seems like a hifi movie but, I thnk neighbors are trying scare me with laser videos projected in room.
